subject: Football
Assaults
Murders and Attempted Murders
lead_paragraph: Prosecutors said that Mitch Cozad was so obsessed with becoming Northern Colorado’s starting punter that he plunged a 5-inch-long knife into his rival’s kicking leg.
snippet: Prosecutors said that Mitch Cozad was so obsessed with becoming Northern Colorado’s starting punter that he plunged a 5-inch-long knife into his rival’s kicking leg.
